content.question: Richelieuâ€™s ideas best reflect which of the following developments in Europe during the 1600s?

choices.label: The effects of the Thirty Years' War on religious policies of European governments
The development of constitutionalism as a form of government in Europe
The creation of new systems of government that centralized state power
The attempt to reunify Europe under a Catholic monarchy

content.answer: The creation of new systems of government that centralized state power

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
